Name: Statue base
Description: The inscribed limestone base of a statue, unfortunately lost in the war. The text is incised around the edges, in front and on top, by Merenptah (or Sethos II) and usurped by Amenmesse, later in the 19th Dynasty. According to the entry in Gatty's catalogue of the Mayer collection: 'The inscriptions are cut round the sides of the pedestal and one of the cartouches has apparently been erased; a kind of blue colouring has been put over the whole.'
